1089961676932288513.Text: The Coens don't bother with classic Western themes in their anthology THE BALLAD OF BUSTER SCRUGGS (2018, A-). Three vignettes take aim at the fickleness of showbiz (mildly mocking producers, performers and the public); the other three are ironic but loving parables on mortality.

1089478863900606464.Title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
1089478863900606464.Text: Last week’s movie: " The Ballad of Buster Scruggs " (2018). The Coen brothers present 6 Old West tales about singing, gunslinging outlaws, bank robbers, weird entertainers, gold diggers, wagon trail travellers and creepy bounty hunters. Good, well-shot, well-cast comedy/drama. 8/10
